message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me taking the larger share.  I'm willing to negotiate, but I think this is a fair starting point.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair. Let's compromise and move forward.
Okay, I'll move a bit closer to your offer. Let's split it 80/20, with me taking the larger share.  We can't let inflation take all the value away!
